title: [IMPORTANT] Security Announcement
text:
Recently there has been a lot of talk around Hacked Accounts. In order to protect your account from hackers, please make sure to:
  • Never share your password or security questions with anyone, not even friends. TFR Admins will never ask you for your password.
  • Do not download and / or use hacked client, as they can store your account name and password.
  • Do not use the same password for your email, your realm account and / or other realm related websites.
  • Some players will try to ask your account information for various "services". Do not give your account to them.

TL;DR: Accounts are being hacked due to users not being careful with their information, not due to Realm's current security system. Only you can protect your account!
